sqlMap.select: SELECT CT.CT_ID, INST.CTI_ID HIGH_CTI_ID, LOC.PATH HIGH_PATH, LOC.FILENAME HIGH_FL_NM, 'A' REQ_GB FROM CONTENTS_LOC_TBL LOC INNER JOIN CONTENTS_INST_TBL INST ON LOC.CTI_ID = INST.CTI_ID INNER JOIN CONTENTS_TBL CT ON INST.CT_ID = CT.CT_ID INNER JOIN (SELECT MASTER_ID, CT_ID FROM CONTENTS_MAPP_tBL GROUP BY CT_ID, MASTER_ID ) MAP ON MAP.CT_ID = CT.CT_ID INNER JOIN METADAT_MST_TBL MST ON MST.MASTER_ID = MAP.MASTER_ID WHERE LOC.JOB_STATUS = 'C' AND LOC.UPDT_DTM < #limitDay# AND (INST.FL_PATH IS NOT NULL AND INST.FL_PATH <> '') AND (CT.DEL_YN IS NULL OR CT.DEL_YN = '' OR CT.DEL_YN = 'N') AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM CART_CONT_TBL CONT INNER JOIN ARIEL_INFO_TBL ARIEL ON CONT.CART_NO = ARIEL.CART_NO AND CONT.CART_SEQ = ARIEL.CART_SEQ AND INST.CTI_ID = CONT.CTI_ID AND ARIEL.STATUS = 'I' ) AND MST.COCD=#coCd# WITH UR

SELECT DOWN.CART_NO, DOWN.CART_SEQ, INST.CTI_ID HIGH_CTI_ID, DOWN.PATH HIGH_PATH, DOWN.FILENAME HIGH_FL_NM, 'D' REQ_GB FROM CONTENTS_DOWN_TBL DOWN LEFT OUTER JOIN CONTENTS_INST_TBL INST ON DOWN.CTI_ID = INST.CTI_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN DOWN_CART_TBL cart on cart.CART_NO = DOWN.CART_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN (select cocd, cart_no, down_Stat from CART_CONT_TBL group by cocd, cart_no, down_Stat) cont on DOWN.CART_NO = cont.CART_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN ARIEL_INFO_TBL ARIEL ON DOWN.CART_NO = ARIEL.CART_NO AND DOWN.CART_SEQ = ARIEL.CART_SEQ WHERE ( DOWN.JOB_STATUS <> 'I' AND DOWN.UPDT_DTM < #limitDay# AND INST.CTI_FMT LIKE '1%' AND (DOWN.DEL_DD IS NULL OR DOWN.DEL_DD = '') AND ( (cart.DOWN_GUBUN = '004' and cont.DOWN_STAT = '009') OR (cart.DOWN_GUBUN <> '004' and cont.DOWN_STAT = '007' AND (ARIEL.STATUS = 'C' OR ARIEL.STATUS = 'E')) OR cart.DOWN_GUBUN = '006' ) ) OR (DOWN.UPDT_DTM < #addLimitDay# AND INST.CTI_FMT LIKE '1%' AND (DOWN.DEL_DD IS NULL OR DOWN.DEL_DD = '')) AND cont.COCD = #coCd# ORDER BY DOWN.NUM DESC WITH UR

SELECT MAP1.CT_ID, MAP1.CNT M1_CNT, VALUE(MAP2.CNT, 0) M2_CNT FROM ( SELECT MAP.COCD, MAP.CT_ID, COUNT(MAP.CT_ID) CNT FROM ( SELECT MTB.COCD, MAPP.MASTER_ID, MAPP.CT_ID FROM CONTENTS_MAPP_TBL MAPP INNER JOIN METADAT_MST_TBL MTB ON MTB.MASTER_ID = MAPP.MASTER_ID WHERE 1=1 AND (MAPP.DEL_YN IS NULL OR MAPP.DEL_YN = 'N') AND MTB.COCD = #coCd# GROUP BY MTB.COCD, MAPP.MASTER_ID, MAPP.CT_ID ) MAP GROUP BY MAP.COCD, MAP.CT_ID ) MAP1 INNER JOIN ( SELECT MAP.COCD, MAP.CT_ID, COUNT(MAP.CT_ID) CNT FROM ( SELECT MTB.COCD, MAPP.MASTER_ID, MAPP.CT_ID FROM CONTENTS_MAPP_TBL MAPP INNER JOIN METADAT_MST_TBL MTB ON MTB.MASTER_ID = MAPP.MASTER_ID WHERE 1=1 AND (MAPP.DEL_YN IS NULL OR MAPP.DEL_YN = 'N') AND (MAPP.DEL_DD IS NOT NULL AND MAPP.DEL_DD <> '') AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM CONTENTS_TBL CT WHERE CT.CT_ID = MAPP.CT_ID AND (CT.DEL_YN IS NULL OR CT.DEL_YN = 'N') ) AND MAPP.DEL_DD <= #limitDay# AND MTB.COCD = #coCd# GROUP BY MTB.COCD, MAPP.MASTER_ID, MAPP.CT_ID ) MAP GROUP BY MAP.COCD, MAP.CT_ID ) MAP2 ON MAP1.CT_ID = MAP2.CT_ID WHERE 1=1 AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM CONTENTS_INST_TBL INST INNER JOIN CONTENTS_DOWN_TBL DOWN ON INST.CTI_ID = DOWN.CTI_ID WHERE MAP2.CT_ID = INST.CT_ID AND DOWN.JOB_STATUS = 'I' AND (DOWN.DEL_DD IS NULL OR DOWN.DEL_DD = '') AND DOWN.REG_DTM > TS_FMT(CURRENT TIMESTAMP - 48 HOURS, 'yyyymmddhhmiss') ) WITH UR

SELECT CT.CT_ID ctId, HIGH.CTI_ID highCtiId, LOW.CTI_ID lowCtiId, HIGH.FL_PATH highPath, ( CASE WHEN LEFT(CT.MEDIA_ID,1) = 'P' THEN HIGH.ORG_FILE_NM WHEN LEFT(CT.MEDIA_ID,1) = 'D' AND HIGH.ORG_FILE_NM IS NULL THEN HIGH.WRK_FILE_NM WHEN LEFT(CT.MEDIA_ID,1) = 'D' AND HIGH.ORG_FILE_NM IS NOT NULL THEN HIGH.ORG_FILE_NM WHEN LEFT(CT.MEDIA_ID,1) = 'M' AND HIGH.ORG_FILE_NM IS NULL THEN HIGH.WRK_FILE_NM WHEN LEFT(CT.MEDIA_ID,1) = 'M' AND HIGH.ORG_FILE_NM IS NOT NULL THEN HIGH.ORG_FILE_NM ELSE HIGH.WRK_FILE_NM END ) highFlNm, LOW.FL_PATH lowPath, LOW.WRK_FILE_NM lowFlNm, HIGH.ARCH_STE_YN archiveSteYn, CT.KFRM_PATH kfrmPath FROM CONTENTS_TBL CT LEFT OUTER JOIN CONTENTS_INST_TBL HIGH ON CT.CT_ID = HIGH.CT_ID AND HIGH.CTI_FMT LIKE '1%' LEFT OUTER JOIN CONTENTS_INST_TBL LOW ON CT.CT_ID = LOW.CT_ID AND HIGH.CTI_FMT LIKE '3%' WHERE CT.CT_ID = #ctId# ORDER BY LOW.CTI_ID DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS only WITH UR

SELECT CT.CT_ID, HIGH.CTI_ID HIGH_CTI_ID, LOW.CTI_ID LOW_CTI_ID, HIGH.FL_PATH HIGH_PATH, ( CASE WHEN LEFT(CT.MEDIA_ID,1) = 'P' THEN HIGH.ORG_FILE_NM WHEN LEFT(CT.MEDIA_ID,1) = 'D' AND HIGH.ORG_FILE_NM IS NULL THEN HIGH.WRK_FILE_NM WHEN LEFT(CT.MEDIA_ID,1) = 'D' AND HIGH.ORG_FILE_NM IS NOT NULL THEN HIGH.ORG_FILE_NM WHEN LEFT(CT.MEDIA_ID,1) = 'M' AND HIGH.ORG_FILE_NM IS NULL THEN HIGH.WRK_FILE_NM WHEN LEFT(CT.MEDIA_ID,1) = 'M' AND HIGH.ORG_FILE_NM IS NOT NULL THEN HIGH.ORG_FILE_NM ELSE HIGH.WRK_FILE_NM END ) HIGH_FL_NM, LOW.FL_PATH LOW_PATH, LOW.WRK_FILE_NM LOW_FL_NM, HIGH.ARCH_STE_YN, CT.KFRM_PATH FROM CONTENTS_TBL CT LEFT OUTER JOIN CONTENTS_INST_TBL HIGH ON CT.CT_ID = HIGH.CT_ID AND HIGH.CTI_FMT LIKE '1%' LEFT OUTER JOIN CONTENTS_INST_TBL LOW ON CT.CT_ID = LOW.CT_ID AND HIGH.CTI_FMT NOT LIKE '1%' WHERE CT.CT_ID = #ctId# WITH UR
